title: National Assembly By-Election (Kabwata Constituency No. 77) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 3) Order, 2021
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government
Gazette dated Friday, 17th December, 2021 679
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 87 OF 2021
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (General) Regulations, 2016
The National Assembly By-Election (Kabwata
Constituency No. 77) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No. 3) Order, 2021
WHEREAS in pursuance of Article 72(8) of the Constitution, the
Speaker of the National Assembly has informed the Electoral Cap. 1
Commission of Zambia of the vacancy in respect of Kabwata
Constituency No. 77 by reason of death of Honourable Levy
Mkandawire, Member of Parliament for Kabwata Constituency,
and the declaration by the Speaker of the National Assembly of
the vacancy of the Parliamentary seat relating to Kabwata
Constituency:
NOW THEREFORE, IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in Article
57 (3) of the Constitution and Regulation 15(1) of the Electoral Cap. 1
Process (General) Regulations, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Assembly By- Title
Election (Kabwata Constituency No. 77) (Election Date and Time
of Poll) (No. 3) Order, 2021.
2. A candidate for election as a Member of Parliament for
Nomination
Kabwata Constituency No. 77 shall lodge a nomination with the for election
Returning Officer on Tuesday, 28th December, 2021, between 0900
hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Tuesday, 28th Campaign
December, 2021, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on period
Wednesday, 19th January, 2022.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a Member of Parliament in Election date
the Constituency referred to in paragraph 2 shall take place on and time of
poll
Thursday, 20th January, 2022, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a Constituency if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 9th
day of December, 2021.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O.Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka Price K4.00 each
680 Statutory Instruments 17th December, 2021
E. CHULU,
